MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete a repair due to damaged electrical equipment on Douglas Wynd, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.58AM on 21st December 2020.
